intro: Escape the nightmare of the Backrooms—if you dare.
description:
Backrooms: Spirits of the Forgotten is a spine-chilling 3D horror game that plunges players into an endless maze of dread. Trapped within the eerie and labyrinthine Backrooms, you must navigate through unsettlingly familiar yet nightmarish environments to find your way out.

As you venture deeper into this supernatural realm, you'll encounter a series of shocking and terrifying moments designed to test your nerves. The Backrooms are fraught with unseen dangers and malevolent entities that lurk in the shadows, waiting to pounce. Your survival hinges on your ability to solve intricate puzzles, manage scarce resources, and evade the lurking spirits that haunt these forsaken halls.

Immerse yourself in a world where the walls seem to close in on you, and every corner could hide a new horror. Can you maintain your sanity long enough to escape, or will you become another lost soul within the Backrooms?

Prepare for an unforgettable horror experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat, as you uncover the dark secrets of the Backrooms and confront the spirits of the forgotten.
